title: Magdalena Bay Add Fall Dates to 2025 North American Tour
description: The new leg includes stops in Los Angeles, Nashville, New Orleans, Atlanta, and Washington, DC. Magdalena Bay Add Fall Dates to 2025 North American Tour Eddie Fu
author: Eddie Fu
excerpt: Magdalena Bay have added a fall North American leg to their 2025 "Imaginal Mystery Tour" in support of their most recent album, Imaginal Disk.
text: Magdalena Bay have added a new leg of fall dates to their 2025 North American “Imaginal Mystery Tour” in support of their sophomore album, Imaginal Disk. Get Magdalena Bay Tickets Here The autumn run kicks off on September 18th in San Francisco, with subsequent stops including Los Angeles, Nashville, New Orleans, Atlanta, and Washington, DC. See Magdalena Bay’s full touring schedule below (new dates in bold). A Live Nation pre-sale for select dates begins on Thursday, February 13th (use access code DUET) in advance of the general on-sale on Friday, February 14th via Ticketmaster. This spring, Magdalena Bay will embark on a short run of Australia before kicking off the first North American leg of their tour in April. See where Imaginal Disk landed on our list of the best albums of 2024. html:
Magdalena Bay have added a new leg of fall dates to their 2025 North American “Imaginal Mystery Tour” in support of their sophomore album, Imaginal Disk.

Get Magdalena Bay Tickets Here

The autumn run kicks off on September 18th in San Francisco, with subsequent stops including Los Angeles, Nashville, New Orleans, Atlanta, and Washington, DC. See Magdalena Bay’s full touring schedule below (new dates in bold).

A Live Nation pre-sale for select dates begins on Thursday, February 13th (use access code DUET) in advance of the general on-sale on Friday, February 14th via Ticketmaster.

This spring, Magdalena Bay will embark on a short run of Australia before kicking off the first North American leg of their tour in April.

See where Imaginal Disk landed on our list of the best albums of 2024.

Magdalena Bay 2025 Tour Dates:
